metadata.title: Jaipur Handloom Cover ONLY -Black Pouf Ottoman Pouffe Foot Stool Bohemian Indian Handmade Embroidered Footstool Seating Pouf Floor Pillow Cover
features: This is just cover, insert is not included .
This stunning piece can be easily filled with scraps of fabric or store-bought poly bean bag filler material
NOTE: INSERT OR FILLING IS NOT INCLUDED, THIS IS ONLY A COVER. Care: Dry Clean Only
Due to handmade and patchwork nature, each pouf cover is unique one of a kind, so you will get assorted color-patches pouf cover , matched with base color. Above pictures are for your reference only.
Size: 22 Inch Diameter X 14 inches Height
description: This is Indian Handmade Multicolored Ottoman cover or pouf cover or stool cover.

These are authentic styles Beautiful ottoman studded with hand Embroidery. In this cover Vintage patches from old, valuable wedding saris & dresses are patched and stitched together at random to create a collage like effect and decorated with all kinds of colored threads, patchwork, raised colored thread work and embroidery in intricate designs. Lined with matching cotton backing with a zipper opening for filling with the insert.

You Will Receive a Similar Color Assorted Patchwork Cover, image is for reference only, actual product will have different patches however the overall theme will be matching colors of patches with base color selected.

It can also be considered as decorative item as they are widely used for home decoration in a very stylish way. This gorgeous Ottoman cover will add warmth style and elegance to any room in your home.

Note:- This is 100% Handmade Item So Little Bit Imperfection Could Be There. You Will Receive a Similar Color Assorted Patchwork Cover  Note- Product Specification  Color: Multi Size: 22 Inch Diameter X 14 inches Height  Material: 100% Cotton  Fabric, vintage patches from old indian wedding saris.  Care: Dry Clean Only Note: Only Cover insert is not included, this is just a cover. FILLING INSTRUCTIONS: This stunning piece can be easily filled with scraps of fabric or store-bought poly bean bag filler material, and used as a comfortable cushion to sit on! Comes unfilled so as not to increase shipping weight.
